message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. A deal's a deal!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but it wasn't quite fair. Let's try this - I take $55, you get $45.  Consider that the value decreases faster for you in the next round.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this. Take it before the money shrinks even more!
